line_1: Where chemic nature mystic wealth distils.
line_2: The pointless pathway of the secret rills,

line_1: No cooling fruit its grateful juice distils,
line_2: Nor flows one balmy drop from crystal rills;

line_1: And dropping from his nose and chin distills.
line_2: His op'ning mouth the melted butter fills,

line_1: By thy command the softening shower distils,
line_2: Till genial warmth the teeming furrow fills;
With plenteous Food and Gladness fills.

line_1: 'Midst her rich groves where odorous balm distils,
line_2: And the charm'd eye th' Elysian landscape fills,

line_1: Where many an ancient brook distils
The pious prophet of her sect distils,
line_2: And her pure soul seraphic rapture fills;

line_1: Fresh through a thousand pipes the wave distils,
line_2: And thirsty cities drink the exuberant rills. —

line_1: "So from the heart the sanguine stream distils,
line_2: O'er Beauty's radiant shrine in vermil rills,

line_1: When no soft shower descends, no dew distills,
line_2: Her wave-worn channels dry, and mute her rills;

line_1: Or rest on the rock whence the streamlet distils,
line_2: Together we range o'er the slow rising hills,

line_1: Ambrosial sweets her infant's lip distils,
line_2: While through the mother's heart quick rapture thrills.

line_1: Earth glitters with the drops the night distils,
line_2: She spreads the morning over eastern hills,
